dct_title_s: DER NEUEN WEST BEGRIFF Bestehende in 2 Haubt Theilen als NORD AMERICA und SUD AMERICA, Warinnen der Erste Meridian nach Frantzosischer art gezogen
dct_description_sm: Without medallions, with complete New Guinee coastline and additional nearby islands, with Land von Jesso and Japon, and with title word "Hollandischer" changed to "Frantzosischer". California with indented northern coastline.
Title along map top. Western Hemisphere with California as an island.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
